description: {"blocks":[{"key":"26es0","text":"We present here an automated CellProfiler (Stirling et al., 2021) software pipeline to quantify the number of primary cilia in cultured cells. The primary cilia were labeled using anti-Arl13b antibodies and nuclei were labeled using DAPI. This protocol works with .czi format images which are acquired using a Zeiss laser scanning confocal microscope and are maximum intensity projected.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad05v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"273d0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"36bnj","text":"Stirling DR, Swain-Bowden MJ, Lucas AM, Carpenter AE, Cimini BA, Goodman A (2021). CellProfiler 4: improvements in speed, utility and usability. BMC Bioinformatics, 22 (1), 433. PMID: 34507520 PMCID: PMC8431850. doi. pdf.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":212,"length":3},{"key":1,"offset":217,"length":3}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F48CD64B4DD311EEAD330A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1186/s12859-021-04344-9"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F48CD64B4DD311EEAD330A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://cellprofiler.org/files/cellprofiler/files/153_Stirling_BMCBioinf_2021.pdf"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
